   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: -module(netconfc_remote_SUITE).
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("common_test/src/ct_netconfc.hrl").
   24: -include("netconfc_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: suite() ->
   29:     [{timetrap,?default_timeout},
   30:      {ct_hooks, [{cth_conn_log,[{ct_netconfc,[{log_type,html}]}]}]}].
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [remote_crash].
   34: 
   35: groups() ->
   36:     [].
   37: 
   38: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   39:     Config.
   40: 
   41: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   45:     stop_node(Case),
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_testcase(Case, _Config) ->
   49:     stop_node(Case),
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: stop_node(Case) ->
   53:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
   54:     Node = list_to_atom("nc_" ++ atom_to_list(Case)++ "@" ++ Host),
   55:     rpc:call(Node,erlang,halt,[]).
   56: 
   57: 
   58: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     code:ensure_loaded(crypto),
   60:     case {ssh:start(),code:is_loaded(crypto)} of
   61: 	{Ok,{file,_}} when Ok==ok; Ok=={error,{already_started,ssh}} ->
   62: 	    ct:log("SSH started locally",[]),
   63: 	    SshDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
   64: 				   "ssh_dir"),
   65: 	    [{ssh_dir,SshDir}|Config];
   66: 	Other ->
   67: 	    ct:log("could not start ssh or load crypto locally: ~p",[Other]),
   68: 	    {skip, "SSH could not be started locally!"}
   69:     end.
   70: 
   71: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   72:     ssh:stop(),
   73:     crypto:stop(),
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: %% This test case is related to seq12645
   77: %% Running the netconf server in a remote node, test that the client
   78: %% process terminates if the remote node goes down.
   79: remote_crash(Config) ->
   80:     {ok,Node} = ct_slave:start(nc_remote_crash,[{boot_timeout,15},
   81: 						{init_timeout,15},
   82: 						{startup_timeout,15}]),
   83:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?NS)),
   84:     true = rpc:call(Node,code,add_patha,[Pa]),
   85:     rpc:call(Node,code,load_file,[crypto]),
   86:     case {rpc:call(Node,ssh,start,[]),rpc:call(Node,code,is_loaded,[crypto])} of
   87: 	{Ok,{file,_}} when Ok==ok; Ok=={error,{already_started,ssh}} ->
   88: 	    ct:log("SSH started remote",[]),
   89: 	    ns(Node,start,[?config(ssh_dir,Config)]),
   90: 	    ct:log("netconf server started remote",[]),
   91: 	    remote_crash(Node,Config);
   92: 	Other ->
   93: 	    ct:log("could not start ssh or load crypto remote: ~p",[Other]),
   94: 	    {skip, "SSH could not be started remote!"}
   95:     end.
   96: 
   97: remote_crash(Node,Config) ->
   98:     {ok,Client} = open_success(Node,?config(ssh_dir,Config)),
   99: 
  100:     ns(Node,expect_reply,[{'create-subscription',[stream]},ok]),
  101:     ?ok = ct_netconfc:create_subscription(Client),
  102: 
  103:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Client),
  104:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process,Client),
  105:     rpc:call(Node,erlang,halt,[]), % take the node down as brutally as possible
  106:     receive {'DOWN',Ref,process,Client,_} ->
  107: 	    ok
  108:     after 10000 ->
  109: 	    ct:fail(client_still_alive)
  110:     end.
  111: 
  112: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  113: 
  114: break(_Config) ->
  115:     test_server:break("break test case").
  116: 
  117: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  118: %% Open a netconf session which is not specified in a config file
  119: open_success(Node,Dir) ->
  120:     open_success(Node,Dir,[]).
  121: 
  122: %% Open a netconf session which is not specified in a config file, and
  123: %% give some extra options in addition to the test defaults.
  124: open_success(Node,Dir,ExtraOpts) when is_list(Dir), is_list(ExtraOpts) ->
  125:     ns(Node,hello,[1]), % tell server to send hello with session id 1
  126:     ns(Node,expect,[hello]), % tell server to expect a hello message from client
  127:     open(Dir,ExtraOpts);
  128: 
  129: %% Open a named netconf session which is not specified in a config file
  130: open_success(Node,KeyOrName,Dir) when is_atom(KeyOrName), is_list(Dir) ->
  131:     ns(Node,hello,[1]),
  132:     ns(Node,expect,[hello]),
  133:     ct_netconfc:open(KeyOrName,?DEFAULT_SSH_OPTS(Dir)).
  134: 
  135: open(Dir) ->
  136:     open(Dir,[]).
  137: open(Dir,ExtraOpts) ->
  138:     Opts = lists:ukeymerge(1,lists:keysort(1,ExtraOpts),
  139: 			   lists:keysort(1,?DEFAULT_SSH_OPTS(Dir))),
  140:     ct_netconfc:open(Opts).
  141: 
  142: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  143: %%% Call server on remote node
  144: ns(Node,Func,Args) ->
  145:     rpc:call(Node,?NS,Func,Args).
  146:
